install.postInstall:
Installation complete! Please restart Claude Code to load all components.

Installed:
• MCP Servers: ChromaDB, Memory Bank, Sequential Thinking, DEVONthink
• Custom Agents: 12 specialized agents (java-developer, code-review-expert, etc.)
• Session Commands: /check, /load, /sessions, /session-delete
• Terminal Tools: tmux-cli, find-session, vault, env-safe
• Safety Hooks: Git, file, and environment protection
• aod (Army of Darkness): Multi-branch parallel development

Next steps:
1. Configure ChromaDB environment variables (if using cloud mode)
2. Try: aod --help, aod-list, tmux-cli --help
3. Test: /sessions, claudebox run
4. See AGENTS.md for agent documentation
